name: coderboost-frontend
description: Frontend for CoderBoost - A programming learning platform

scripts.build: vite build && npm run copy-views && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-views: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path dist/views)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist/views -Force }; Copy-Item -Path views/* -Destination dist/views/ -Recurse"
scripts.copy-assets: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path dist/assets/images)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist/assets/images -Force }; Copy-Item -Path assets/images/* -Destination dist/assets/images/ -Recurse"

author: CoderBoost Team
